message.content: cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NEURON - The paper proposes a deep-learning method for learning stable and temporally coherent feature spaces for point clouds, which is a problem commonly addressed in computer vision (cs.CV) and computer graphics (cs.GR). The paper also introduces a novel temporal loss function, which is a technique commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) to improve the performance of deep-learning models. Finally, the paper uses a super-resolution method with a truncation approach, which is a technique commonly used in neural networks (cs.NEURON) to adapt the size of the generated positions.
